subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Frank / Friends

full_text:

>>
>>
>> It is interesting that you posted this because I was thinking of asking

>> Thanks,

>>
>> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com <EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com>, Rick Wegrzyn
>> <rickwegrzyn@...> wrote:
>> >
>> > I've been investigating for 33 years...The day I got that "BOX" really

>> other hand
>> > We're getting our names called and asnwers to "Do You Know Where You Are
>> ?" An d
>> > the response made us stop and wonder...reponse was "In the
>> basement"......HELLO
>> > we're in the Basement......Also I believe it will bring out the EVIL
>> > SIDE...which we did..and both my house as well as our partners seems to
>> have
>> > someone that has followed us,turning on lights in the kitchen and
>> opening the
>> > kitchen cabinets up,It made me feel sick all day and affected our
>> cat...not to
>> > mention simular things at our partners home...Be careful what you say
>> and ask
>> > for...cause you might get more than you want.....Love Ya Frank....Rick
>> >
>>
>>
>
>  
>

Maybe jus some hing/someone don' wan you using he box.
